overview:
Summary

In 2008, Robert joined Amazon.com (with over $19.billion in revenue) as a Senior Recruiter in a new specialised headhunting team. From 2005 to 2008, Robert was a Research manager at Derwent Executive, a boutique executive search firm based in Sydney Australia. He was responsible for full-cycle executive search execution of a variety of C-level assignments for â€“ telecommunications, information tech, financial services, fast moving consumer goods, and business services clients. While managing relationships with his clients, Robert developed recruiting strategies that optimized candidate pipeline based on market conditions, client criteria and compensation/geographical constraints â€“ for the most part hands on research and managing two reports on retained search assignments with focused candidate profiling.

Specialties

Executive Search & Selection Consultant; Executive Research; Market Intelligence; Senior Researcher; Recruitment Consultant; Exposure to multiple Industry Sectors; Amazon; Software Development Engineering; Selection process Shortlisting; Background insights.

Robert Newby is a go to point at Amazon for the executive level Software Development engineering community.
